help.Developpement:
Development is divided into 2 types:

{{aide:Colonisation:Colonization}}: If targeting a free province
(if lvl.1-2 must be connected, if lvl.3 no condition).

{{aide:Expansion:Expansion}}: If targeting an owned province.

Conflicts:
- If 2 clans want the same adjacent province: it remains neutral.
- If 2 clans target the same province: the clan with the most honor yields and receives 6 Chao as compensation.

{{tableau:honneur}}
help.Colonisation:
Colonization:
Recovers the targeted territory and its adjacent ones.
lvl. 2-3: +2 chao.
help.Expansion:
Expansion:
lvl 1-2: recovers territories adjacent to the targeted group.
lvl 2: +2 chao.
lvl 3: build a {{aide:Temple:temple}} (if absent) + steal 2 Chao from neighboring clans.
help.Fortification:
Fortification is divided into two types:

{{aide:Urbanisation:Urbanization}} if targeting an owned village.
{{aide:Renforcement:Reinforcement}} if targeting an owned city.
help.Urbanisation:
Urbanization:


Lvl.1: no effect.

Lvl.2: becomes a city.

Lvl.3: +1 army, becomes a fortified city (Protects the territory as if 2 additional armies were present.)
help.Renforcement:
Reinforcement:

Lvl.1: becomes a double city ‚Üí counts as 2 territories of the same type for action cost reduction.

Lvl.2: becomes a fortified double city (Protects the territory as if 2 additional armies were present.)

Lvl.3: becomes an impregnable city + protects adjacent allied territories by 1; +1 army.
help.Militarisation:
Militarization is divided into 2 types:

{{aide:Recrutement:Recruitment}}: if the target is an owned city.

{{aide:Attaque:Attack}}: if the target is an enemy province.
‚ö†Ô∏è You must have at least one army connected to the target.
help.Recrutement:
Recruitment

Lvl.1: no effect

Lvl.2: +1 army

Lvl.3: +3 armies

üëâ At the end of the turn, each province is limited to 3 armies max.
help.Attaque:
Attack

Lvl.1-2-3:
- All your connected armies attack.
- Armies cancel each other 1 for 1.
- If at least 1 army remains ‚Üí province won.

Lvl.2-3: +1 army during the attack.

Lvl.3: if you win the battle, then perform a free strength 1 attack (without army) against all adjacent enemy provinces.
help.Temple:
Temple

You win the game if you own the indicated number of temples.

This number decreases by 1 every 2 turns.

In case of a tie, the clan with the most honor wins.

{{tableau:honneur}}
help.Chao:
Chaos are the game‚Äôs currency. You earn 6 of them if you take no action during a turn.
{{tableau:chao}}
Action costs:
Lvl.0 and Lvl.1: free
Lvl.2: 4 Chao
Lvl.3: 7 Chao

Reductions:
Each owned rice field reduces the cost of a {{aide:Developpement:development}} action by 1.
Each owned forest reduces the cost of a {{aide:Fortification:fortification}} action by 1.
Each owned mine reduces the cost of a {{aide:Militarisation:militarization}} action by 1.
A 'double city' doubles the reduction of the province on which it is placed.

All your owned provinces are indicated at the top of the screen.
